name: The Frustratingly Stupid No Good Very Bad Platformer
name_original: The Frustratingly Stupid No Good Very Bad Platformer
description:
A very strange game I made while bored in school. All of the levels are designed to be very difficult, it starts off easy but gets exponentially harder. Please don't hate on it just because you can't do it, but if you have some feedback that's great! 

if you beat all of the levels, then you get a cool surprise!

made with Construct 3

check out my youtube which I haven't uploaded anything in 7 months: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvQoyx3-HLp-O8GeM6daKNw/featured
